name: Shoukaku
acquisitionMethod: Limited Build in Visitors Dyed in Red

1.name: Default
1.description: First ship of the Shoukaku Class aircraft carriers-Shoukaku

limitBreak.tier1: Number of Torpedo Bombers +1 / Torpedo Bomber Efficiency +5%
limitBreak.tier2: Hangar Capacity +1 / Number of Torpedo Bombers +1 / Torpedo Bomber Efficiency +10%
limitBreak.tier3: Number of All Planes +1 / Torpedo Bomber Efficiency +15%

1.name: Gokkousen (Shoukaku)
1.description: When paired with Zuikaku, own Air Power increases by 12% (30%). Damage TAKEN increases by 5%.

2.name: Crane's Protection
2.description: After launching an airstrike, for 12 seconds, all ally's damage dealt is increased by 4% (10%), damage taken is decreased by 4% (10%).

1.chinese: 翔鹤级航空母舰一番舰—翔鹤
1.chineseTL: First ship of the Shoukaku Class aircraft carriers-Shoukaku

2.chinese: 第五航空战队旗舰翔鹤~因为笨蛋前辈们轻率地死掉不得已扛起了赤城重樱航空部队的大旗，虽然战绩比前·辈们高了一点点但总是被说比前·辈们弱，大概是因为谢幕得不够快不够华丽吧——那么，再重新自我介绍一下，我是重樱航空战队的守护之羽——大型舰队空母，翔鹤~，请多关照~
2.chineseTL: I am the flagship of the Fifth Carrier Division, Shoukaku. Because of those stupid seniors who passed on so easily, I had to carry the flag of the Sakura Nation's Carrier Divisions. Even though I accomplished slightly more than my seniors, but I am always considered to be worse than my seniors, perhaps this is due to the lack of grace and speed of my finale. So, let me reintroduce myself: I am Sakura Nation Carrier Division's wing of protection, large fleet carrier Shoukaku, I will be in your care.
2.japanese: 先輩たちが先にいなくなったせいで、航空部隊の要を担当しました。妹と先輩たち以上頑張ったのに、何故かか弱い印象がついっちゃって……改めまして、重桜艦隊「被害担当」・翔鶴です。よろしくお願いしますね。うふふ♪
2.japaneseTL: Because my predecessors perished, I was left in charge of the core of the air force. Even though my little sister and I worked harder than them, for some reason we left the impression that we were weaker… Let me reintroduce myself, I'm Shoukaku, the Sakura Empire's "punching bag". Pleased to make your acquaintance. (Giggles)♪

3.chinese: 第五航空战队旗舰翔鹤，今后会以一航战的前·辈们为目标，好好努力的！噗嗤~别露出那种表情啊~开玩笑的~
3.chineseTL: As the flagship of the Fifth Carrier Division, Shoukaku shall work hard to towards becoming like my seniors in the First Carrier Division...Pfft ~don't look at me like that ~I'm just kidding~
3.japanese: 第五航空戦隊旗艦、翔鶴です。……一航戦の先輩たちについて？…「先輩たちを目標に頑張ります！」ってどう？うふふ♪今のはわ・ざ・とですよ？
3.japaneseTL: I'm Shoukaku, the 5th Carrier Division's flagship. …A word about my predecessors from the 1st Carrier Division? …How about "I 'll work hard to try be as good as them!"? (Giggles)♪ I did that on purpose.

4.chinese: 通往胜利的路还很漫长……指挥官，我能守护好大家吗？
4.chineseTL: It is still a long way to victory...Commander, will I be able to protect everyone?
4.japanese: 知性は女の魅力とよく言いますけど…おかげさまで「先輩方」とはよくギスギスになっちゃいます－－うふふ、困っちゃいます♪
4.japaneseTL: They say that intelligence is a woman's charm… But thanks to that, I'm often at odds with my predecessors. (Giggles) How troublesome♪

5.chinese: 我的笛声是亡者的安魂乐……指挥官，你想听一曲吗？
5.chineseTL: The melody of my flute is a requiem for the dead. Commander, do you want to listen to it?
5.japanese: この笛の調は、亡者を鎮める鎮魂歌…指揮官、一曲いかがでしょうか？うふふ♪
5.japaneseTL: The melody of this flute is a requiem to appease the dead… Would you like me to play a song, Commander? (Giggles)♪

6.chinese: 一直和一航战的前·辈们相处，指挥官一定很辛苦吧~
6.chineseTL: Having to deal with seniors from the First Carrier Division, Commander must have worked hard~
6.japanese: 一航戦の先輩たちに振り回されて、指揮官も大変ですね…
6.japaneseTL: Working with my predecessors from the 1st Carrier Division must be hard for you, Commander…

7.chinese: 虽说好像是加害者与被害者的关系，不过，在各个方面今后都请加多指教了哟，列克星敦~
7.chineseTL: Even though our relationship is that of a victimiser and a victim's, but I still look forward to working with you, Lexington~
7.japanese: 前は加害者と被害者だったけど…これからもよろしくお願いしますね。レキシントンさん？
7.japaneseTL: Although you were once a victim and I the perpetrator… Now we'll be working together instead, right, Lexington?

8.chinese: 瑞鹤，再给白鹰的同·僚们添麻烦的话，今天晚上你就只能吃天妇罗咯
8.chineseTL: Zuikaku, if you trouble our White Eagle Union 'colleagues' any more, you will only be getting tempura for tonight's dinner.
8.japanese: 瑞鶴、ユニオンの「僚艦」にまた迷惑をかけたら、今夜の天ぷらは…増やしておきますね？うふふ♪
8.japaneseTL: Zuikaku, if cause any more trouble for our Union colleagues then I'll get you… more deep fried food for tonight. (Giggles)♪

9.chinese: 指挥官，想听一听我的笛声吗？
9.chineseTL: Commander, would you care to listen to the melody of this flute?
9.japanese: 指揮官、この笛の調べ、お聞きになりませんか？
9.japaneseTL: Would you like to like me to play a melody with my flute, Commander?

10.chinese: 指挥官，请沉浸在翔鹤的温柔中吧
10.chineseTL: Commander, indulge yourself in Shoukaku's gentleness.
10.japanese: 指揮官、この翔鶴にもっと溺れてもいいんですよ
10.japaneseTL: I don't mind if you want to take part of me more, Commander.

11.chinese: 我来看看任务……不是去珊瑚海呢，真遗憾~
11.chineseTL: Let me see the task...not going to Coral Sea hmm, too bad~
11.japanese: 任務を確認しますね。……珊瑚海じゃないんだ、残念～
11.japaneseTL: I'll check the mission. …It's not in the Coral Sea, that's too bad~

12.chinese: 九段渐减邀击计划……嘁，不实行啊
12.chineseTL: Nine Phase Whittling Down assault strategy...tsk, we are not doing it?
12.japanese: 漸減邀撃（ぜんげんようげき）……実行しないのですか？ちぇ
12.japaneseTL: We're not going to… put our plans of attrition warfare into action? Tsk.

13.chinese: 邮件上写司令部决定实行AL/MI计划……了……开玩笑的~
13.chineseTL: The mail says that the headquarters have decided to execute the AL/MI operation...Just kidding~
13.japanese: 本部から艦隊決戦作戦の決行って、メールが…うふふ♪今のは冗談ですよ－
13.japaneseTL: We got a mail from HQ, they told us to carry out the Decisive Battle Doctrine… (Giggles)♪ That was just a joke.

14.chinese: 像我们五航战一样平稳地回到港口了呢
14.chineseTL: Just like the Fifth Carrier Division, we have safely arrived at the harbour.
14.japanese: 皆無事に港に戻ってきましたね。そう、私たち五航戦のように、ね♪
14.japaneseTL: Everyone returned to harbor safe and sound. Yup, just like us, the 5th Carrier Division♪

15.chinese: 为了丸五计划，这些也是必须的
15.chineseTL: For the Maru Five plan, these are necessary.
15.japanese: マル五計画のために、委託の遂行も必要ですね
15.japaneseTL: It's necessary to carry out commissions for the sake of the Circle Five Plan.

16.chinese: 这样就能更好的保护大家了~
16.chineseTL: Now I can better protect everyone~
16.japanese: これで瑞鶴をもっと上手く守れますね
16.japaneseTL: Now I can defend Zuikaku better.

17.chinese: 理想型舰队航母——翔鹤，出击！
17.chineseTL: Ideal type fleet carrier, Shoukaku, sortieing!
17.japanese: 完成されし正規空母－－翔鶴、参る！
17.japaneseTL: The perfected aircraft carrier: Shoukaku, onward!

18.chineseTL: Glory to the Fifth Carrier Division ~Pfft~
18.japanese: 「五航戦の栄光ここにあり！」…うふふ♪
18.japaneseTL: The glory of the 5 th Carrier Division is here! …(Giggles)♪

19.chinese: 真遗憾~我可不会像飞龙前·辈那样不知进退
19.chineseTL: Too bad~ I am not going to be like Hiryuu, who doesn't know when to retreat.
19.japanese: 飛龍先輩なら沈むまで戦うかもしれないけど… 私は違うわ。うふふ、残念ね
19.japaneseTL: Hiryuu may be willing to fight till the very end, but… I'm not like that. (Giggles) Shame.

20.chineseTL: This is an older sister's right!
20.japaneseTL: This is a big sister's privilege♪

21.chineseTL: Quick! Inject water from the other side!
21.japaneseTL: Pump water into the other side! Hurry!

22.chinese: 我似乎看到指挥官被前·辈砍杀的未来了呢
22.chineseTL: I think i just saw a future where commander was slashed by my seniors.
22.japanese: 指揮官が……赤城先輩に刺される未来が見えます。うふふ♪
22.japaneseTL: I see… a future where Akagi is stabbing you, Commander. (Giggles)♪

23.chinese: 我和妹妹鹤在最艰难的时刻并肩作战了两年，要是前辈们能在争点气的话……
23.chineseTL: My sister and I fought together for two years during the toughest times, if only those seniors had worked harder...
23.japanese: 妹とあの一番厳しい二年間を乗り越えたけど、あの「センパイ」たちにもっと頑張って欲しかったですね……
23.japaneseTL: My little sister and I managed to endure the two most difficult years of our lives, but I wish our predecessors would have worked harder…

24.chinese: 对一二航战的不满？当然有啦——自说自话地抛弃了妹妹的姐姐，不可能不遭妹妹怨恨吧
24.chineseTL: Am I holding a grudge against the First and Second Carrier Divisions? Of course I am! Those so called "older sisters" didn't care about the younger sisters they left behind at all, of course the younger sisters will hold a grudge.
24.japanese: 先輩への不満？ええ、ありますとも－－あの状況を作り出しておいて、妾の子にだってものを言う資格があるでしょ？
24.japaneseTL: Dissatisfied with my predecessors? Yes, I am. Even the child of a whore would have the right to complain if they were put in that sort of situation, don't you think?

25.chinese: 一航战和二航战太狡猾了！明明我马上就要超越她们了——却一下子跑到了我永远也触及不到的地方！真是太狡猾了！
25.chineseTL: The First and Second Carrier Division are so cunning! Just when I was about to overtake them, they suddenly go to a place that I can never reach! They are really unfair!
25.japanese: 聞いてください指揮官！先輩たちはズルいんです！もうすぐで追い越せそうなのに－－またすぐずっと上に行って！もう…本当にズルいんです！
25.japaneseTL: Commander, please listen! My predecessors are playing dirty! Even though I was so close to catching up to and surpassing them, they quickly leapt out of reach again! Sigh… They just won't play fair!

26.chinese: 指挥官，我可以借下你的肩膀吗……有时我也会想什么都不想地发会呆呢……到时候我可以依靠你吗？
26.chineseTL: Commander, may I borrow your shoulder? Sometimes I also want to have no worries and just blank out, when that time comes, can I rely on you to do this again?
26.japanese: 指揮官、肩を貸していただけますか？…うん…私にもボーっとしたくなる時があります……これからも、こうして寄り添ってもいいでしょうか…
26.japaneseTL: Commander, can you give me a shoulder to lean on? …Mh… Sometimes even I just want to stop for a moment and relax… Can I cuddle with you like this again in the future…?

27.chinese: 我的笛音宛若流水，是以纵情吹之必立于高山。不过——比起高山，现在是你的身侧更适合我的笛声呢
27.chineseTL: The melody of my flute is like a flowing river, if I want to inject my emotions into it, I must play it atop of a mountain. But, as compared to a mountain, being by your side seems to be more suitable for my melody.
27.japanese: この笛の奏でる調べは、鎮魂曲にあらず－－五航戦・翔鶴、これからはずっと、あなたの側に……
27.japaneseTL: The melody that this flute plays is not a requiem. For from now on, I, Shoukaku of the 5th Carrier Division, will forever be by your side…

28.chinese: （瑞鹤）瑞鹤，全力攻击！我来掩护你！
28.chineseTL: (Zuikaku) Zuikaku, give it your all! I will cover you!

29.chinese: （赤城）看到我的实力了吗，赤城姐！
29.chineseTL: (Akagi) Do you see my true power, Akagi!
29.japanese: （赤城と出撃）私の実力を見ましたか？赤城先輩！
29.japaneseTL: (Sortie with Akagi) Did you see what I'm really capable of? Akagi!

30.chinese: （加贺）这次……绝对会让你承认我的实力！
30.chineseTL: (Kaga) This time, I will make you recognize my ability!
30.japanese: （加賀と出撃）今度こそ…絶対に認めさせるんだから！
30.japaneseTL: (Sortie with Kaga) This time… I'll make you truly admit how strong I am!

31.chinese: （列克星敦）离我太远，防空圈会保护不到你的~
31.chineseTL: (Lexington) If you stay too far away, I will not be able to cover you.
31.japanese: （レキシントンと出撃）うふふ♪これ以上離れると援護してあげられませんよ？
31.japaneseTL: (Sortie with Lexington) (Giggles)♪ If you stray so far from me I won't be able to support you, you know?

32.chinese: （萨拉托加）修理厂女皇是要上哪巡游啊？
32.chineseTL: (Saratoga) Where is the Queen of the Dock cruising to?
32.japanese: （サラトガと出撃）ドックの引きこもりちゃんはどこに出かけるおつもり？うふふ♪
32.japaneseTL: (Sortie with Saratoga) Where do you think you're going, little Miss Stuck-In-The-Dock? (Giggles)♪

33.japanese: 指揮官、いつもありがとうございます。指揮官へのチョコレートト、お受け取り下さい。これからは私たち五航戦を「今以上」よろしくお願いします♪
33.japaneseTL: Thank you for everything you do, Commander. I hope you'll accept this chocolate meant for you. The 5th Carrier Division looks forward to working with you even more in the future♪

34.japanese: 指揮官、お疲れ様です。私からチョコレートのプレゼントです。このチョコに込めているのはいつもの感謝という、指揮官への私の気持ち、そして……赤城先輩より先に贈れてよかったです、はい♪
